events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Identified case as refund request due to incorrect product delivery as described by customer.
The case has been assigned to agent John Smith for further handling of the refund request.
Hello, this is John from customer support. Iâ€™m sorry to hear about the issue with your order, let me assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the received item so we can verify and expedite your refund?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached is a photo of the incorrect item I received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and the offer to refund. Looking forward to getting my money back promptly.
The refund process has been confirmed and is underway; you should receive the funds within the stated timeframe.
Checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Since the refund has been processed and confirmed received by the customer, the case is now closed.
